_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The cause and reason why sometimes even: Heart is overcome and mired in sensual desire
Heart is overcome and mired in ill will
Heart is overcome and mired in dullness and drowsiness
Heart is overcome and mired in restlessness and remorse
Heart is overcome and mired in doubt
